rooms.description: A welcoming open space with natural light enhancing the Bohemian aesthetic.
An integrated kitchen and living space designed for modern cooking practices and social interaction. Includes a central island with decorative elements inspired by Bohemian style.
Private master bedroom located in the quieter zone of the villa, with a balcony and ample natural lighting.
Additional bedroom for family members, designed to maintain energy balance in accordance with Vastu principles.
Third bedroom ensuring optimal space utilization while preserving privacy and cultural elements of a Bohemian villa.
Dedicated space for the domestic help, ensuring privacy and adherence to local building norms.

openings.description: A welcoming entryway aligned with the villa's aesthetic and Vastu guidelines.
Strategically placed to optimize natural light across the open-plan living area and kitchen.

additional_features.description: The layout has been designed to adapt to the irregular plot shape with creative use of curved walls and partitioning.
Incorporates eclectic decorative elements, mixed textures, and vibrant colors in line with Bohemian style.

levels.notes: Design adheres to local building norms. Vastu principles have been incorporated where applicable, ensuring harmony between space and natural energy flow. The design is subject to further customization based on client preferences and site-specific conditions.
